application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 9 (Renewables) of planning permission 18/00213/FUL (Demolition of existing 8 garages to rear. Erection of new building comprising of 2 x 2 bed residential units with roof space accommodation, including associated car parking and landscaping)
decision_conditions: Due to insufficient information submitted for Condition 9 (Renewables) of planning permission 18/00213/FUL the proposal would not be in the interest of sustainability and does not comply with Policy 5.3 (Sustainable Design & Construction) of the London Plan (July 2011) and Policy DM1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012 .
